description: ['The Ubora Towers is a complex of two towers located in Business Bay comprising a 56-storey office tower and a 16-storey apartment building. ', 'Icon Tower is a complex featuring two residential towers. Icon Tower 2 is located in Cluster L, which was completed in 2008. The 151 metres tall tower has an iconic exterior that complements the building’s title. There are retail outlets, offices and 1 to 3-bedroom apartments and studios. Based on contemporary architecture, the building interiors have marble or tiled flooring and stylish wooden fixtures. ', 'For enquiries and exclusive viewing, call Khushi Verma (BRN#57400) at ', ' or email us at ', ' We are happy to assist you from 9 am to 6 pm (Monday to Friday), 9 am to 2 pm (Saturday). description: ['Key View is proud to present this stunning two bedroom apartment in the lively Dubai Marina. Exquisitely styled & in a brand new luxurious building you will love staying here on your upcoming vacation. The brand new building also features a state of the art gymnasium, swimming pool and private on site parking. This opulent two bedroom apartment in the Dubai Marina is bright and stylish resulting in a lovely homely feel. ', 'Property Features:', '- Marina Views', '- Shared pool & gym', '- Fully equipped kitchen', '- High speed WIFI (average speeds of 250mbps) perfect for remote working', 'Sleeping Arrangements:', '- Master Bedroom - Queen sized bed', '- 2nd bedroom - Queen sized bed', 'Location:', 'The Marina Mall is only a 5 minute walk away where you can enjoy the high street shops & many tantalizing restaurants & lounges. If the sun & sand is more your scene, you are only a 5 minute drive away from the iconic JBR Beach with numerous water sports and activities to enjoy all day long. The Dubai Marina runs along 3km of the most picturesque and pristine sands that face the Arabian Gulf. As you walk or cycle down the Dubai Marina, the evening lights will mesmerize you, as you settle down at one of the many amazing restaurants or a drink at a cosmopolitan canal side coffee bar. The Dubai Marina Walk has plenty to do with a beautiful beachfront paved walkway with over 300 outlets and more than 70 restaurants to keep you entertained and active. ', 'Long term stays allowed (weekly, monthly, yearly)', 'Multiple layouts avaliable (1 & 2 Bedrooms)', 'For more details please feel free to contact us', 'House Rules:', "House rules include respecting the neighbours, furniture and no Parties whatsoever. Smoking allowed only on the outside terrace. Adherence to Dubai laws and regulations at all times. This apartment is fully licensed with Dubai's Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (DTCM). Please note the included cleaning fee is for the apartment to be cleaned after your stay. If you require additional cleaning during your stay, this can be arranged for an additional fee. ", 'Daily housekeeping & cleaning can be arranged for a fixed fee with 24 hours notice upon request. It is a self contained apartment, and we provide you with a starter pack of toiletries, please note consumables such as cooking condiments, cleaning products, additional toiletries are not provided. ', 'Fees:', '• All guests are required to pay a refundable damage deposit of AED 2,500', '• Damage deposits must be paid by cash', '• All deposits will be returned by bank transfer 7-14 days after check out', '• Cleaning fee of AED 350', '• Tourist tax is AED 20 per night', 'Check in:', '• Personally greeted check in', '• Check in from 3pm-9pm', '• Check out from 11am', '• Early check in/late check out can be requested however this is not guaranteed']

", "Mira Oasis in Reem is renowned as a family-centric community, conveniently situated near schools, hospitals, and the esteemed Arabian Ranches Golf Course. ", "Don't miss out on this rare chance to secure a contemporary 3-bedroom villa in Mira Oasis. location: Burj Vista 1, Burj Vista, Downtown Dubai, Dubai
description: ["This luxurious 3-bedroom apartment in Downtown Dubai epitomizes city living at its finest. Nestled within the vibrant Burj Vista, the property boasts breathtaking skyline views that can be savored through its expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. The light and airy ambiance, paired with its prime location, makes it ideal for individuals aiming to immerse themselves in Dubai's most esteemed locales. ", "The apartment features three bedrooms, three bathrooms, a comfortable lounge area, a maid's room, and a contemporary open-plan kitchen. The master suite is notable for its spacious layout, built-in wardrobes, and exclusive private balcony. Each corner of this residence speaks of opulence with its high-standard finishes and top-tier furnishings, catering perfectly to executives and families alike. ", 'Residents are treated to an array of exceptional amenities, from a refreshing swimming pool, a tennis court, to a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Furthermore, the 24-hour concierge service ensures the utmost convenience for its occupants. ', 'Living in Burj Vista means being part of a lively and appealing community in Downtown Dubai. The locale is enriched with a plethora of amenities such as shopping centres, gourmet restaurants, and renowned schools. Additionally, the convenience of direct access to the Dubai Metro elevates Burj Vista as the perfect home for families and professionals. ']

description: ['Upgraded 5 bedroom + Study', 'Maids', '2 external driver rooms', 'Private pool + Jacuzzi', 'Overlooking pool and park', 'Beautiful tropical garden', 'Outside Gym', 'This stunning and well known Saheel 5 bedroom villa has been upgraded & extended for families who are looking for a large plot & internal space.  This villa offers 5 spacious bedrooms (one on the ground floor and 4 on the first level) as well as a separate study/office room. The villa is bright and airy with huge wall to ceiling windows and doors. Enjoy cooking in the stunning and well-arranged closed Kitchen, with an attached well lit dining room. It offers a huge centre island and an abundance of storage. The large family room off the kitchen now opens up to the living and dining space with white gorgeous stone slabs for flooring which is eye catching and easy to maintain. ', 'As we move upstairs to the first level the master bedroom is spacious and bright with a wonderful bathroom fitted with double sinks and both a separate shower and tub. Large wall to wall wardrobe so there is no need to fight over the closet space. The second bedroom is exceptionally large and perfect for those with children who need their own space - once again this bedroom offers wall to wall closet space. The third and fourth bedrooms are both generous in size; they also share the famous Jack n Jill bathrooms whilst the 4th bedroom is complete with its own ensuite bathroom. All rooms offer built-in robes. ', 'permit no']
